text:
When installing Tomcat6 using the Windows Installer,  the  Java Options are setup to define the endorsed   ir  as  -Djava.endorsed.dirs=${catalina.home}\common\endorsed    However, if using the   service.bat   it sets this  to  -Djava.endorsed.dirs=${catalina.home}\endorsed

The latter is the way the DOC  describes the location of the endorsed dirs.
I think the windows installer   is Incorrect.   I can go back in and change the Registry  but is very distruptive and confusing  and causes   deployment problems
creator: bruce.carson@nc4.us

text: Thanks for the report. It has been fixed in trunk and proposed for 6.0.x
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Ther patch has been applied to 6.0.x and will be in 6.0.17 onwards.
